body:
### Describe the bug
performing command
`python setup.py build_ext --inplace`
 under /Demos subfolder results in error. Error message reads:
```
Compiling benchmarks\bm_cython.pyx because it changed.
Compiling benchmarks\locking\locks.pyx because it changed.
Compiling callback\cheese.pyx because it changed.
Compiling embed\embedded.pyx because it changed.
Compiling freeze\combinatorics.pyx because it changed.
Compiling freeze\lcmath.pyx because it changed.
Compiling integrate1.pyx because it changed.
Compiling integrate2.pyx because it changed.
Compiling libraries\call_mymath.pyx because it changed.
Compiling overflow_perf.pyx because it changed.
Compiling primes.pyx because it changed.
Compiling spam.pyx because it changed.
[ 1/12] Cythonizing benchmarks\bm_cython.pyx
[ 2/12] Cythonizing benchmarks\locking\locks.pyx
[ 3/12] Cythonizing callback\cheese.pyx
[ 4/12] Cythonizing embed\embedded.pyx
[ 5/12] Cythonizing freeze\combinatorics.pyx
[ 6/12] Cythonizing freeze\lcmath.pyx
[ 7/12] Cythonizing integrate1.pyx
[ 8/12] Cythonizing integrate2.pyx
[ 9/12] Cythonizing libraries\call_mymath.pyx
[10/12] Cythonizing overflow_perf.pyx
[11/12] Cythonizing primes.pyx
[12/12] Cythonizing spam.pyx
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "F:\HL\dev\git\ML\cython\Demos\setup.py", line 22, in <module>
    ext_modules.extend(cythonize(numpy_demo))
                       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\HL\dev\git\ML\cython\Demos\..\Cython\Build\Dependencies.py", line 978, in cythonize
    module_list, module_metadata = create_extension_list(
                                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\HL\dev\git\ML\cython\Demos\..\Cython\Build\Dependencies.py", line 849, in create_extension_list
    m, metadata = create_extension(template, kwds)
                  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  File "F:\HL\dev\git\ML\cython\Demos\..\Cython\Build\Dependencies.py", line 712, in default_create_extension
    include_dirs = kwds.get('include_dirs', []) + ["."]
                   ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~^~~~~~~
TypeError: can only concatenate str (not "list") to str
```
PR is to follow

### Code to reproduce the behaviour:
N/A
Issue is related to environmental variations + platform
PR accounts for variances in both through type check using isinstance operator.

### Expected behaviour
Compilation completes free of errors

### OS
OS: Windows 10
### Cython version
Cython version 3.1.4### Python version
### Additional context
Python version: Python 3.12.5
Current Cython master branch commit id: 3ada45d1852699921f5a28da769a550aa15ae267
Command is performed using the following tool:

<details>

`x64 Native Tools Command Prompt for VS 2022`
Visual Studio build: 
```
Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022
Version 17.14.13 (August 2025)
```

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report (and the proposed PR). I've fixed the setup.py script.

milestone.description: First feature release after the cleanup releases 3.0 and 3.1.

title: [BUG] TypeError: can only concatenate str (not "list") to str message reported in Cython/Build/Dependencies.py
